title: Oathsworn
body: when your oathsworn champion afks please make the item re-purchasable.

replies.body: Make it so that if they DC you have the option to pull them to you from base and when you throw them it instantly activates their ultimate, sure the enemy get a free kill but the AFK becomes cannon fodder to distract them while you take them out.

That's making it more complicated than it needs to be. Riot should just make it so if the person you've bound to is recognised as AFK/disconnected by the game it will allow you to re-bind to someone else using the 'Black Spear' item that is available for free through the in-game store.
The item is purchasable. For free no less.
